short_summary: Purchasing a Single-Photon Avalanche Diode (SPAD) camera
description: This tender is for purchasing a single-photon avalanche diode (SPAD) camera.
full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**

### Tender Details

* **Tender Title (English/French)**: 31184-224561-Purchasing a Single-Photon Avalanche Diode (SPAD) camera / 31184-224561-Achat d'un système de caméra à photodiode avalanche à photon unique
* **Reference Number (English/French)**: WS3688570676-Doc3688699434 / WS3688570676-Doc3688699434
* **Publication Date (English/French)**: October 3, 2022 / Octobre 3, 2022

### Tender Status

* **Tender Closing Date (English/French)**: October 18, 2022 at 2:00 PM EDT / 18 octobre 2022 at 14 :00 HAE
* **Tender Status (English/French)**: Executed (Expired) / Exécuted (Expiré)

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity** (English): Department of Public Works and Government Services
* **Contracting Entity** (French): Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux
* **Contracting Entity Address** (English): 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address** (French): 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities** (English): National Research Council of Canada
* **End User Entities** (French): Conseil national de recherches du Canada
* **End User Entities Address** (English): 100 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6, Canada
* **End User Entities Address** (French): 100, promenade Sussex, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6, Canada
* **Contact Information** (English):
	+ Name: Annie Blanchet
	+ Email: annie.blanchet@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Trade Agreements** (English): Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Trade Agreements (French)**: Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

### Notice URL

* **URL (English)**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/r
